desc_1: Delicately lush, deeply sweet. Blueberry, bergamot, wisteria, chocolate fudge, a hint of whisky in aroma and cup. Bright, lively acidity; syrupy but buoyant mouthfeel. The resonant, flavor-saturated finish carries through on all the promises of the cup, including the suggestion of highlands Scotch whisky, a discreet touch of elegant, fruit-toned sweet ferment.
desc_3: An exciting natural Yirgacheffe cup, both classic in brightly sweet structure and exotic in lush, complex detail.
text: Delicately lush, deeply sweet. Blueberry, bergamot, wisteria, chocolate fudge, a hint of whisky in aroma and cup. Bright, lively acidity; syrupy but buoyant mouthfeel. The resonant, flavor-saturated finish carries through on all the promises of the cup, including the suggestion of highlands Scotch whisky, a discreet touch of elegant, fruit-toned sweet ferment.  An exciting natural Yirgacheffe cup, both classic in brightly sweet structure and exotic in lush, complex detail.

desc_1: Deeply sweet, richly savory. Butterscotch, lavender, tamarind, roasted cacao nib, mango in aroma and cup. Big, juicy acidity; viscous, velvety mouthfeel. In addition to resonant butterscotch and lavender tones in the short finish, the long introduces an appealing coconut note.
desc_3: A Pacamara on steroids, in the best possible sense, with butterscotch and lavender, in particular, in 3-D.

desc_1: Expressive, balanced, richly sweet. Lemon blossom, baker’s chocolate, cashew butter, aged Tequila, tea rose in aroma and cup. Vibrant, balanced acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Lemon blossom and cashew butter carry the short finish, while notes of aged Tequila, suggesting a refined sweet ferment, return in the long, enveloped by baker’s chocolate.
desc_3: A costly but rare and prestigious gift for the coffee-lover who values intricate yet elegant natural-processed Geshas.
text: Expressive, balanced, richly sweet. Lemon blossom, baker’s chocolate, cashew butter, aged Tequila, tea rose in aroma and cup. Vibrant, balanced acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. desc_1: Crisply bright, resonantly sweet. Candied orange zest, nougat, sandalwood, vanilla, pineapple guava in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; delicate, billowy mouthfeel. Candied orange zest is the leading note in the flavor-saturated short finish, while pineapple guava and sandalwood, with a whisper of vanilla, resonate in the long.
desc_3: One of the loveliest blends we tested in 2016, distinguished by rich aromatics and appealing tropical flavor notes.
text: Crisply bright, resonantly sweet. Candied orange zest, nougat, sandalwood, vanilla, pineapple guava in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; delicate, billowy mouthfeel. Candied orange zest is the leading note in the flavor-saturated short finish, while pineapple guava and sandalwood, with a whisper of vanilla, resonate in the long. One of the loveliest blends we tested in 2016, distinguished by rich aromatics and appealing tropical flavor notes.

desc_1: Delicate, high-toned, sweetly tart. Lemon verbena, toffee, pomegranate, dark chocolate, lavender in aroma and cup. Vibrantly tart acidity; very silky, smooth mouthfeel. The quietly expressive finish centers around crisp lemon verbena notes and hints of spicy lavender.
desc_3: A very pretty citrus-toned Gesha, packaged for the holidays in a reusable glass jar. Organic to boot.

desc_1: Delicate, intricately rich. Jasmine, sandalwood, lychee, roasted cacao nib, orange zest in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart acidity; silky-smooth mouthfeel. The aromatic wood-framed finish is crisp in the short, rounding to cocoa tones in the long.
desc_3: A lovely, balanced natural-processed Ethiopia from Limu, a growing area less-known than the iconic Yirgacheffe and Sidamo regions.
text: Delicate, intricately rich. Jasmine, sandalwood, lychee, roasted cacao nib, orange zest in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart acidity; silky-smooth mouthfeel. The aromatic wood-framed finish is crisp in the short, rounding to cocoa tones in the long. desc_1: Bold, sweetly spice-toned. Molasses, hazelnut, cedar, persimmon, orange blossom in aroma and cup. Mild, balanced acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. The gently drying finish offers notes of cedar and orange blossom in the short, consolidating to hazelnut in the long.
desc_3: An unusual Gesha, more nut-toned than floral, hearty rather than delicate, likely to particularly appeal to those who prefer a slightly darker-roasted presentation of this celebrated coffee variety.
text: Bold, sweetly spice-toned. Molasses, hazelnut, cedar, persimmon, orange blossom in aroma and cup. Mild, balanced acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. An unusual Gesha, more nut-toned than floral, hearty rather than delicate, likely to particularly appeal to those who prefer a slightly darker-roasted presentation of this celebrated coffee variety.

desc_1: Delicately rich, crisp, balanced. Dried apricot, baker’s chocolate, rhododendron, orange zest, cinnamon in aroma and cup. Lively, juicy acidity; velvety mouthfeel. Cinnamon-like spice leads in the short finish; dried fruit and vanilla-like flowers resonate in the long.
desc_3: A classic coffee blend, sweet and rich, packaged in a hand-printed bag featuring local art, and one in a series of Red Rooster’s special Advent calendar coffee releases.
text: Delicately rich, crisp, balanced. Dried apricot, baker’s chocolate, rhododendron, orange zest, cinnamon in aroma and cup. Lively, juicy acidity; velvety mouthfeel. origin: Holualoa, North Kona growing district, “Big Island” of Hawaii
desc_1: Intense, deeply aromatic, richly sweet. Dark chocolate, scorched lemon zest, rose, passion fruit, vanilla in aroma and cup. Engaging, fruit-toned acidity; syrupy mouthfeel. The crisp finish consolidates to a cocoa-toned passion fruit with continued appealing notes of lemon zest.
desc_3: A classic revival of the original Kona strain of Typica: sweet-tart fruit notes and rich chocolate and florals. Limited availability.
text: Intense, deeply aromatic, richly sweet. Dark chocolate, scorched lemon zest, rose, passion fruit, vanilla in aroma and cup. Engaging, fruit-toned acidity; syrupy mouthfeel. The crisp finish consolidates to a cocoa-toned passion fruit with continued appealing notes of lemon zest. A classic revival of the original Kona strain of Typica: sweet-tart fruit notes and rich chocolate and florals. Limited availability.

origin: Sidama (also Sidamo) growing region, southern Ethiopia
desc_1: Sweetly and richly spicy. Mango chutney, baker’s chocolate, freesia, tamarind, cumin in aroma and cup. Juicy, sweet-tart acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The clean, resounding finish is laden with floral and chocolate notes, with an intriguing hint of cumin.
desc_3: A spice-toned natural-processed Ethiopia, packaged in an apothecary bottle as a vitamin might be, suggesting the health benefits of good coffee.
text: Sweetly and richly spicy. Mango chutney, baker’s chocolate, freesia, tamarind, cumin in aroma and cup. Juicy, sweet-tart acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The clean, resounding finish is laden with floral and chocolate notes, with an intriguing hint of cumin.  A spice-toned natural-processed Ethiopia, packaged in an apothecary bottle as a vitamin might be, suggesting the health benefits of good coffee.

desc_1: Sweetly pungent, rich-toned. Apricot, pipe tobacco, narcissus, dark chocolate, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. The flavor-saturated finish opens with spicy chocolate tones in the short, followed by intimations of deep pipe tobacco and sweet narcissus in the long.
desc_3: A compelling holiday blend, named for the popular winter-season flower: sweet, spicy, richly floral.
text: Sweetly pungent, rich-toned. Apricot, pipe tobacco, narcissus, dark chocolate, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. The flavor-saturated finish opens with spicy chocolate tones in the short, followed by intimations of deep pipe tobacco and sweet narcissus in the long. desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Deeply rich, intricately aromatic. Sandalwood, tangerine zest, baker’s chocolate, ripe plum, wisteria in aroma and small cup. Delicate, silky mouthfeel; floral-toned, zesty, slightly drying finish. Softens and blooms with vast, flavor-saturated elegance in three parts milk: chocolate, plum, flowers, more.
desc_3: Pleasingly crisp and complex as a straight shot, but particularly impressive in cappuccino-scaled milk, where the shot blossoms vibrantly without losing complexity.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Deeply rich, intricately aromatic. Sandalwood, tangerine zest, baker’s chocolate, ripe plum, wisteria in aroma and small cup. desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Rich, deep, roundly spicy. A particularly aromatic cedar plus caramel, almond butter, peach, rose-like flowers in aroma and small cup. Full, velvety mouthfeel. Flavor consolidates around a cedar-toned chocolate in a resonant finish. Crisp and delicate in three parts milk: continued cedar and chocolate.
desc_3: A particularly deep, balanced straight shot, accessible, satisfying, resonant.

desc_1: Intense, floral- and cocoa-toned. Honeysuckle, pineapple guava, orange zest, roasted cacao-nib, sandalwood. Deep, complexly expressed acidity; syrupy mouthfeel. The resonant finish consolidates around guava and zesty orange notes.
desc_3: A big, resonant dried-in-the-fruit Yirgacheffe, brightly fruit-toned and lushly floral.
text: Intense, floral- and cocoa-toned. Honeysuckle, pineapple guava, orange zest, roasted cacao-nib, sandalwood. Deep, complexly expressed acidity; syrupy mouthfeel. The resonant finish consolidates around guava and zesty orange notes.  A big, resonant dried-in-the-fruit Yirgacheffe, brightly fruit-toned and lushly floral.

desc_1: Brisk, cidery. Apple cider, fresh-cut fir, caramel, mint, a hint of hop flowers in aroma and cup. Round, brisk acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Remains crisp but sweetens and brightens in an apple- and fir-dominated finish.
desc_3: A discreet ferment turns the fruit toward cider in this crisp natural-process Costa Rica.
text: Brisk, cidery. Apple cider, fresh-cut fir, caramel, mint, a hint of hop flowers in aroma and cup. Round, brisk acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Remains crisp but sweetens and brightens in an apple- and fir-dominated finish. A discreet ferment turns the fruit toward cider in this crisp natural-process Costa Rica.

desc_1: Richly and roundly roast-toned. Plum, baker’s chocolate, lightly scorched cedar, vanilla, a hint of flowers in aroma and cup. Roast-rounded acidity, lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Vanilla and chocolate carry into a roasty but sweet finish.
desc_3: An impressive dark roast, round, balanced and chocolate- and plum-toned.
text: Richly and roundly roast-toned. Plum, baker’s chocolate, lightly scorched cedar, vanilla, a hint of flowers in aroma and cup. Roast-rounded acidity, lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Vanilla and chocolate carry into a roasty but sweet finish. An impressive dark roast, round, balanced and chocolate- and plum-toned.

desc_1: Softly roast-toned, quietly chocolaty. Chocolate, raisin, almond, scorched fir, a hint of violet-like flowers in aroma and cup. Roast-muted acidity, very lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Sweetly chocolaty in the short finish, fading a bit in the long.
desc_3: A soft, quiet-spoken darker roast, gently chocolaty and raisin-toned.
text: Softly roast-toned, quietly chocolaty. Chocolate, raisin, almond, scorched fir, a hint of violet-like flowers in aroma and cup. Roast-muted acidity, very lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Sweetly chocolaty in the short finish, fading a bit in the long. A soft, quiet-spoken darker roast, gently chocolaty and raisin-toned.

desc_1: Rich, roast-rounded. Almond, dark chocolate, strawberry guava, rhododendron-like flowers, orange zest in aroma and cup. Mild, sweet-toned acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The chocolate-framed finish is quietly resonant and deeply sweet, with continued hints of flowers.
desc_3: A solid blend with holiday appeal: nut-toned chocolate and vanilla-like florals.
text: Rich, roast-rounded. Almond, dark chocolate, strawberry guava, rhododendron-like flowers, orange zest in aroma and cup. Mild, sweet-toned acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The chocolate-framed finish is quietly resonant and deeply sweet, with continued hints of flowers. A solid blend with holiday appeal: nut-toned chocolate and vanilla-like florals.

desc_1: Delicate, vibrantly sweet. Hibiscus, roasted cocoa nib, dried mulberry, frankincense, candied orange zest in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy-tart acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Rich-toned, layered finish: dried mulberry notes in the short, cocoa-toned hibiscus in the long.
desc_3: A crisp, delicate, tartly floral-toned coffee with particularly intriguing berry and citrus suggestions.
text: Delicate, vibrantly sweet. Hibiscus, roasted cocoa nib, dried mulberry, frankincense, candied orange zest in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy-tart acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Rich-toned, layered finish: dried mulberry notes in the short, cocoa-toned hibiscus in the long. A crisp, delicate, tartly floral-toned coffee with particularly intriguing berry and citrus suggestions.

desc_1: Fruit-forward, spicy-sweet. Ripe peach, pink peppercorn, lilac, chocolate fudge, almond in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; velvety mouthfeel. The sweet-toned finish is resonantly floral-toned, with supporting notes of stone fruit and chocolate.
desc_3: An intense but balanced natural-processed Panama coffee, fruit-driven and deeply floral.
text: Fruit-forward, spicy-sweet. Ripe peach, pink peppercorn, lilac, chocolate fudge, almond in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; velvety mouthfeel. The sweet-toned finish is resonantly floral-toned, with supporting notes of stone fruit and chocolate. An intense but balanced natural-processed Panama coffee, fruit-driven and deeply floral.

desc_1: Deeply sweet, balanced. Honey, peach, lavender, almond, baker’s chocolate in aroma and cup. Gentle, backgrounded acidity; full, silky mouthfeel. The gently drying finish is crisply sweet, redolent of nut-toned honey.
desc_3: An appealing coffee for those who appreciate crisp fruit in a chocolaty and subtly floral cup.
text: Deeply sweet, balanced. Honey, peach, lavender, almond, baker’s chocolate in aroma and cup. Gentle, backgrounded acidity; full, silky mouthfeel. The gently drying finish is crisply sweet, redolent of nut-toned honey. An appealing coffee for those who appreciate crisp fruit in a chocolaty and subtly floral cup.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly rich, chocolaty. Chocolate fudge, myrrh, sandalwood, frangipane, lavender in aroma and small cup. Full, fudge-like body. The lavender- and sandalwood-inflected finish is also deeply chocolaty, resonant and sweet. Sweet and savory are enticingly balanced in three parts milk.
desc_3: A big, round, intense floral- and chocolate-driven Yirgacheffe espresso.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly rich, chocolaty. Chocolate fudge, myrrh, sandalwood, frangipane, lavender in aroma and small cup. Full, fudge-like body. The lavender- and sandalwood-inflected finish is also deeply chocolaty, resonant and sweet. Sweet and savory are enticingly balanced in three parts milk. A big, round, intense floral- and chocolate-driven Yirgacheffe espresso.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Crisp, intensely sweet, balanced. Jasmine, tangerine, cedar, baker’s chocolate, almond in aroma and small cup. Plush, syrupy body. The richly drying, sweet finish consolidates to almond and fruit-toned chocolate. Both the almond and chocolate carry brightly into three parts milk.
desc_3: A crisp, citrus-toned, chocolaty espresso with an engaging story and origin. Particularly fine as a straight shot.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Crisp, intensely sweet, balanced. Jasmine, tangerine, cedar, baker’s chocolate, almond in aroma and small cup. Plush, syrupy body. The richly drying, sweet finish consolidates to almond and fruit-toned chocolate. Both the almond and chocolate carry brightly into three parts milk. A crisp, citrus-toned, chocolaty espresso with an engaging story and origin. Particularly fine as a straight shot.

desc_1: Roast-toned, sweetly spicy. Apricot, cedar, scorched lemon zest, dark chocolate, black peppercorn in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; satiny mouthfeel. The crisp, dry finish centers on cedar-toned chocolate notes with a hint of black peppercorn.
desc_3: A good choice for those who appreciate a tactfully dark-roasted blend that maintains its fruit and chocolate notes throughout the profile, with support from deep spice tones.
text: Roast-toned, sweetly spicy. Apricot, cedar, scorched lemon zest, dark chocolate, black peppercorn in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; satiny mouthfeel. The crisp, dry finish centers on cedar-toned chocolate notes with a hint of black peppercorn. A good choice for those who appreciate a tactfully dark-roasted blend that maintains its fruit and chocolate notes throughout the profile, with support from deep spice tones.

desc_1: Bold, caramel-toned. Caramel, baker’s chocolate, cedar, black cherry, magnolia in aroma and cup. Rounded, gentle acidity; lean, satiny mouthfeel. The gently drying finish is wood-framed, with sweet notes of caramel and chocolate.
desc_3: A sweetly crisp, accessible honey-processed Costa Rica cup.
text: Bold, caramel-toned. Caramel, baker’s chocolate, cedar, black cherry, magnolia in aroma and cup. Rounded, gentle acidity; lean, satiny mouthfeel. The gently drying finish is wood-framed, with sweet notes of caramel and chocolate.  A sweetly crisp, accessible honey-processed Costa Rica cup.

desc_1: Sweetly roast-toned, chocolaty. Dark chocolate, gently scorched oak, cashew, lily-like flowers, dried apple in aroma and cup. Gentle, backgrounded acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. The rich, gently drying finish is laden with chocolate tones in the short and smoky oak and sweet flowers in the long.
desc_3: A fine holiday blend for those who favor darker-roasted coffees with gentle acidity and rich chocolate notes.
text: Sweetly roast-toned, chocolaty. Dark chocolate, gently scorched oak, cashew, lily-like flowers, dried apple in aroma and cup. Gentle, backgrounded acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. The rich, gently drying finish is laden with chocolate tones in the short and smoky oak and sweet flowers in the long.  A fine holiday blend for those who favor darker-roasted coffees with gentle acidity and rich chocolate notes.

desc_1: Sweetly tart, deeply floral. Honeysuckle, mango, sarsparilla, butterscotch, pipe tobacco in aroma and cup. Juicy, buoyantly tart acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. The quietly resonant finish centers around sarsparilla and butterscotch.
desc_3: Reminiscent in part of a very sophisticated essence of root beer float, this attractive Kenya is deep, sweet and richly smooth.
text: Sweetly tart, deeply floral. Honeysuckle, mango, sarsparilla, butterscotch, pipe tobacco in aroma and cup. Juicy, buoyantly tart acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. The quietly resonant finish centers around sarsparilla and butterscotch. desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Sweet, gently spicy, pungent. Hazelnut, apricot, lily-like flowers, fresh-cut fir, a hint of frankincense in aroma and small cup. Velvety mouthfeel. Fir and a suggestion of chocolate animate a quiet, sweet-toned finish. Fir and nut-toned chocolate dominate in three-parts milk.
desc_3: Solid, quietly complex espresso, animated by a sweet aromatic wood and backgrounded chocolate.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Sweet, gently spicy, pungent. Hazelnut, apricot, lily-like flowers, fresh-cut fir, a hint of frankincense in aroma and small cup. Velvety mouthfeel. Fir and a suggestion of chocolate animate a quiet, sweet-toned finish. Fir and nut-toned chocolate dominate in three-parts milk. Solid, quietly complex espresso, animated by a sweet aromatic wood and backgrounded chocolate.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Exuberant, vibrantly composed. Buttery chocolate, wisteria, blood orange zest, almond, pineapple guava in aroma and small cup. Creamy, smooth mouthfeel. The rich finish is flower-forward and chocolaty, precise in its clarity. It continues to impress in three parts milk, which further sweetens the chocolate notes and rounds the bright fruit tones.
desc_3: An exhilarating single-origin Yirgacheffe espresso: classically balanced; richly sweet, elegant and engaging.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Exuberant, vibrantly composed. Buttery chocolate, wisteria, blood orange zest, almond, pineapple guava in aroma and small cup. Creamy, smooth mouthfeel. The rich finish is flower-forward and chocolaty, precise in its clarity. It continues to impress in three parts milk, which further sweetens the chocolate notes and rounds the bright fruit tones. An exhilarating single-origin Yirgacheffe espresso: classically balanced; richly sweet, elegant and engaging.

desc_1: Luscious, sweetly savory. Candied yam, sarsaparilla, baker’s chocolate, rhododendron-like flowers, pomegranate in aroma and cup. Round, balanced acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. The cleanly resonant finish is carried by sarsaparilla and sweet yam notes.
desc_3: An invitingly juicy, yet intriguingly sweet-savory Sulawesi coffee.
text: Luscious, sweetly savory. Candied yam, sarsaparilla, baker’s chocolate, rhododendron-like flowers, pomegranate in aroma and cup. Round, balanced acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. The cleanly resonant finish is carried by sarsaparilla and sweet yam notes. An invitingly juicy, yet intriguingly sweet-savory Sulawesi coffee.

desc_1: Luscious, deeply sweet, sumptuous. Blackberry, lavender, marjoram, roasted cacao nib, grapefruit zest in aroma and cup. Rich, juicy acidity; smooth, syrupy mouthfeel. The long, flavor-saturated finish is zesty and sweet, offering a surprise appearance of tropical fruit notes (coconut) that resonate for a long while.
desc_3: An exuberant expression of the classic Kenya cup: sweetly pungent, deeply rich, laden with berry and spicy floral suggestions throughout.
text: Luscious, deeply sweet, sumptuous. Blackberry, lavender, marjoram, roasted cacao nib, grapefruit zest in aroma and cup. Rich, juicy acidity; smooth, syrupy mouthfeel. The long, flavor-saturated finish is zesty and sweet, offering a surprise appearance of tropical fruit notes (coconut) that resonate for a long while. An exuberant expression of the classic Kenya cup: sweetly pungent, deeply rich, laden with berry and spicy floral suggestions throughout.

desc_1: Deeply rich, sweetly tart. Pink grapefruit zest, pipe tobacco, hazelnut, pineapple, lantana in aroma and cup. Crisp, very juicy acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. The flavor-saturated finish leads with rich notes of floral-toned pipe tobacco in the short, hazelnut and pineapple in the long.
desc_3: A deeply aromatic, invitingly tart wet-hulled Sumatra cup, with characteristic notes of sweet pipe tobacco and rich tropical fruit tones.
text: Deeply rich, sweetly tart. Pink grapefruit zest, pipe tobacco, hazelnut, pineapple, lantana in aroma and cup. Crisp, very juicy acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. The flavor-saturated finish leads with rich notes of floral-toned pipe tobacco in the short, hazelnut and pineapple in the long. A deeply aromatic, invitingly tart wet-hulled Sumatra cup, with characteristic notes of sweet pipe tobacco and rich tropical fruit tones.

desc_1: Deeply sweet, round, balanced. Blueberry, hazelnut, pipe tobacco, orange zest, graham cracker in aroma and cup. Crisp, richly tart acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The rich-toned finish leads with ripe blueberry notes in the short; a citrus-toned hazelnut resurfaces in the long.
desc_3: Exciting array of sweet fruit and nut notes, livened by orange zest and grounded by suggestions of rich pipe tobacco.
text: Deeply sweet, round, balanced. Blueberry, hazelnut, pipe tobacco, orange zest, graham cracker in aroma and cup. Crisp, richly tart acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Exciting array of sweet fruit and nut notes, livened by orange zest and grounded by suggestions of rich pipe tobacco.

desc_1: Delicate, sweetly tart. Lemon zest, nougat, cedar, mango, narcissus-like flowers in aroma and cup. Crisp, gentle acidity; lean, silky mouthfeel. The richly drying finish consolidates around aromatic wood tones, with intimations of sweet-tart mango.
desc_3: An invitingly accessible, crisply sweet Sidamo cup.
text: Delicate, sweetly tart. Lemon zest, nougat, cedar, mango, narcissus-like flowers in aroma and cup. Crisp, gentle acidity; lean, silky mouthfeel. The richly drying finish consolidates around aromatic wood tones, with intimations of sweet-tart mango. An invitingly accessible, crisply sweet Sidamo cup.

desc_1: Delicate, deeply sweet. Baker’s chocolate, magnolia, peach, black peppercorn, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Gentle, rounded acidity; velvety mouthfeel. The richly drying finish consolidates to baker’s chocolate and peach.
desc_3: An engaging coffee particularly appealing to those who value delicate, cocoa-toned coffees with gentle acidity and engaging spice notes. Reassuring environmental and socio-economic credentials.

desc_1: Richly and sweetly pungent. Concord grape, roasted cacao nib, cedar, hazelnut, lemon blossom in aroma and cup. Brisk, lightly juicy acidity; delicate, satiny mouthfeel. The crisp, nut-toned finish leads with Concord grape notes in the short and cedar in the long, with hazelnut throughout.
desc_3: A solid blend that offers deep fruit notes with sweet nut and aromatic wood complications. Reassuring environmental and socio-economic credentials.
text: Richly and sweetly pungent. Concord grape, roasted cacao nib, cedar, hazelnut, lemon blossom in aroma and cup. Brisk, lightly juicy acidity; delicate, satiny mouthfeel. desc_1: Deeply rich, sweetly savory. Dried mulberry, pipe tobacco, wisteria, tamarind, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Juicy, balanced acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. The crisp, sweet-toned finish centers around mulberry and cacao nib in the short, with suggestions of tamarind resurfacing in the long.
desc_3: A classic Kenya cup: deeply floral, with a pleasing, richly resonant balance of sweet and savory.
text: Deeply rich, sweetly savory. Dried mulberry, pipe tobacco, wisteria, tamarind, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Juicy, balanced acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Balanced, sweetly tart. Dark chocolate, pomegranate, Oolong tea, rose-like flowers, almond in aroma and small cup. Delicate, silky mouthfeel. Clean, sweet finish, with a savory resonance. In three parts milk, chocolate tones re-emerge, along with hints of roasted almond.
desc_3: An appealing espresso blend: deeply sweet, invitingly savory, with a fruit-tartness suggesting pomegranate.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Balanced, sweetly tart. Dark chocolate, pomegranate, Oolong tea, rose-like flowers, almond in aroma and small cup. Delicate, silky mouthfeel. Clean, sweet finish, with a savory resonance. In three parts milk, chocolate tones re-emerge, along with hints of roasted almond. An appealing espresso blend: deeply sweet, invitingly savory, with a fruit-tartness suggesting pomegranate.

desc_1: Tropical, sweet, wine-toned. Port wine, papaya, oak, molasses, a hint of hibiscus in aroma and small cup. Juicy, fermenty acidity; plush mouthfeel. Sweet and wine-toned in the short finish, richly drying in the long.
desc_3: A you-know-who-you-are coffee. Those who enjoy big, sweetly fermenty, fruit-forward coffees (usually natural-processed; here honey-processed) will like this one. Those purists whose ideal is a fresh, cleanly bright, classic cup most likely will not like this one.

Those purists whose ideal is a fresh, cleanly bright, classic cup most likely will not like this one.

desc_1: Intricately composed, deeply sweet-savory. Pink grapefruit zest, chocolate fudge, dried papaya, roasted pumpkin, fresh bay leaf in aroma and cup. Crisply sweet-tart acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. The finish leads with rich chocolate fudge notes in the short, followed by roasted pumpkin and bay leaf in the long.
desc_3: A resonantly aromatic Pacamara cup with a sweetly savory throughline and inviting rich chocolate complication.
text: Intricately composed, deeply sweet-savory. Pink grapefruit zest, chocolate fudge, dried papaya, roasted pumpkin, fresh bay leaf in aroma and cup. desc_1: Subtle, complexly layered. Candied ginger, pomegranate, rhododendron, cashew butter, bergamot in aroma and cup. Zesty, balanced acidity; delicate, satiny mouthfeel. The quietly resonant finish consolidates around cashew and rhododendron suggestions.
desc_3: Quietly original in its layering of sweet flowers, tart fruit and spicy ginger suggestions.
text: Subtle, complexly layered. Candied ginger, pomegranate, rhododendron, cashew butter, bergamot in aroma and cup. Zesty, balanced acidity; delicate, satiny mouthfeel. The quietly resonant finish consolidates around cashew and rhododendron suggestions. Quietly original in its layering of sweet flowers, tart fruit and spicy ginger suggestions.

desc_1: Deeply rich, sweetly spicy. Butterscotch, pipe tobacco, rhododendron, juniper berry, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Lively, juicy acidity; plush, velvety mouthfeel. The engaging finish is laden with notes of sweet pipe tobacco and butterscotch.
desc_3: Elegantly exotic and bold. Should appeal to those who enjoy rich, flavor-saturated, deeply nuanced coffees.
text: Deeply rich, sweetly spicy. Butterscotch, pipe tobacco, rhododendron, juniper berry, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Lively, juicy acidity; plush, velvety mouthfeel. The engaging finish is laden with notes of sweet pipe tobacco and butterscotch. Elegantly exotic and bold. Should appeal to those who enjoy rich, flavor-saturated, deeply nuanced coffees.

desc_1: Sweetly and richly enticing. Baker’s chocolate, Graham cracker, dried cranberry, orange blossom, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and cup. Crisp, balanced acidity; satiny mouthfeel. The richly drying finish consolidates to baker’s chocolate in the short finish, with aromatic wood notes resurfacing in the long.
desc_3: A solid Guatemala cup: deeply sweet, with a chocolate throughline.
text: Sweetly and richly enticing. Baker’s chocolate, Graham cracker, dried cranberry, orange blossom, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and cup. Crisp, balanced acidity; satiny mouthfeel. desc_1: Fruit-toned, deeply pungent. Blueberry, rum cordial, fresh-cut fir, baker’s chocolate, gardenia-like flowers in aroma and cup. Fruit-forward acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The quiet finish is characterized by cocoa-toned blueberry in the short and hints of aromatic wood in the long.
desc_3: A sweetly and discreetly fermenty cup that will appeal to those who enjoy lushly fruit-toned coffees with cocoa and aromatic wood complication.
text: Fruit-toned, deeply pungent. Blueberry, rum cordial, fresh-cut fir, baker’s chocolate, gardenia-like flowers in aroma and cup. Fruit-forward acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. origin: Holualoa, North Kona growing district, “Big Island” of Hawaii
desc_1: Seductively pungent, richly sweet, tropical. Cognac, almond butter, frankincense, lychee, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. The crisp finish is richly nut-toned in the short, while tropical fruit notes (lychee) return in the long, along with a pleasing new coconut (the fruit flesh) note.
desc_3: A rare coffee from an extraordinary, low-bearing variety that is worth the premium you’ll pay for its originality and intense, intricate aromas and flavors.
text: Seductively pungent, richly sweet, tropical. Cognac, almond butter, frankincense, lychee, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. The crisp finish is richly nut-toned in the short, while tropical fruit notes (lychee) return in the long, along with a pleasing new coconut (the fruit flesh) note.
