origin: Holualoa, North Kona growing district, “Big Island” of Hawaii
desc_1: Rich, deeply floral. Dried mango, narcissus, dark chocolate, marjoram, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Round, balanced acidity; syrupy mouthfeel. The gently drying finish is carried by dark chocolate and sweet marjoram notes.
desc_3: A Kona cup both classically balanced yet distinctive in its sweet herb and floral tones and backgrounded dark chocolate.
text: Rich, deeply floral. Dried mango, narcissus, dark chocolate, marjoram, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Round, balanced acidity; syrupy mouthfeel. The gently drying finish is carried by dark chocolate and sweet marjoram notes. A Kona cup both classically balanced yet distinctive in its sweet herb and floral tones and backgrounded dark chocolate.

desc_1: Intensely sweet and savory, exotic. Passionfruit, frankincense, grapefruit zest, rose, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Bright, lyrical acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The rich, long, cocoa-toned finish is flavor-saturated, all the notes from the cup persisting, passionfruit and grapefruit zest in particular.
desc_3: A compelling classic Kenya coffee, perfectly suspended between sweet and savory, sweetly tart yet deeply rich.
text: Intensely sweet and savory, exotic. Passionfruit, frankincense, grapefruit zest, rose, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Bright, lyrical acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The rich, long, cocoa-toned finish is flavor-saturated, all the notes from the cup persisting, passionfruit and grapefruit zest in particular.  A compelling classic Kenya coffee, perfectly suspended between sweet and savory, sweetly tart yet deeply rich.

desc_1: Delicate, intricate, expressive. Almond butter, plumeria, roasted cacao nib, myrrh, loquat in aroma and cup. Lively sweet-tart acidity; silky mouthfeel. The sweet-toned, resonant finish centers around plumeria and cocoa, with suggestions of myrrh in the short finish and loquat in the long.
desc_3: A quietly exciting Pacamara cup, both delicate and rich, with exotic floral (plumeria) and fruit (loquat) notes throughout.
text: Delicate, intricate, expressive. Almond butter, plumeria, roasted cacao nib, myrrh, loquat in aroma and cup. Lively sweet-tart acidity; silky mouthfeel. The sweet-toned, resonant finish centers around plumeria and cocoa, with suggestions of myrrh in the short finish and loquat in the long. A quietly exciting Pacamara cup, both delicate and rich, with exotic floral (plumeria) and fruit (loquat) notes throughout.

desc_1: Delicate, crisp, sweet-savory. Black currant, maple syrup, candied orange zest, jasmine, sage in aroma and cup. Balanced, lightly juicy acidity; leanish but satiny mouthfeel. The resonant finish leans toward savory suggestions in the short (sage); fruit notes (black currant, candied orange zest) revive in the long.
desc_3: A delicate but vivid Kenya cup; should particularly appeal to those who enjoy crisp, sweet-savory juxtapositions in food and beverages.
text: Delicate, crisp, sweet-savory. Black currant, maple syrup, candied orange zest, jasmine, sage in aroma and cup. Balanced, lightly juicy acidity; leanish but satiny mouthfeel. The resonant finish leans toward savory suggestions in the short (sage); fruit notes (black currant, candied orange zest) revive in the long. A delicate but vivid Kenya cup; should particularly appeal to those who enjoy crisp, sweet-savory juxtapositions in food and beverages.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Smooth, fragrant, lively. The three reviewers for this coffee lined up nicely in respect to rating: John DiRuocco at 93, Jen Apodaca at 93, and Ken at 94. All found the buoyant, richly silky mouthfeel particularly impressive (Jen: “light and airy on the tongue like a meringue cookie”). All three reviewers additionally cited caramel notes, and two sweet flowers. The subtle but explicit sweetness attracted a range of candy-toned positives, from vanilla marshmallow (Jen) to, in three parts milk, dulce de leche (John).
desc_3: A finely balanced, melodic espresso, satiny in the small cup and sweetly seductive in milk.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Smooth, fragrant, lively. The three reviewers for this coffee lined up nicely in respect to rating: John DiRuocco at 93, Jen Apodaca at 93, and Ken at 94. All found the buoyant, richly silky mouthfeel particularly impressive (Jen: “light and airy on the tongue like a meringue cookie”). All three reviewers additionally cited caramel notes, and two sweet flowers. The subtle but explicit sweetness attracted a range of candy-toned positives, from vanilla marshmallow (Jen) to, in three parts milk, dulce de leche (John). A finely balanced, melodic espresso, satiny in the small cup and sweetly seductive in milk.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. All three reviewers praised this espresso for its clean, citrusy/orangy sweetness: “orange hard candy” for co-taster Jen Apodaca (94); orange and brown sugar for John DiRuocco (93); tart but juicy blood orange for Ken (93). All found notes that rounded and complicated the citrus: the brown sugar for John, caramel for Ken, Concord grape for Jen. Jen was most enthusiastic and explicit about what this coffee brought to three parts milk: “tasted like cherry pie.”
desc_3: A nicely balanced version of the new American style of espresso: bright but not too bright, naturally sweet, citrusy but roundly and ripely so.
text: Evaluated as espresso. All three reviewers praised this espresso for its clean, citrusy/orangy sweetness: “orange hard candy” for co-taster Jen Apodaca (94); orange and brown sugar for John DiRuocco (93); tart but juicy blood orange for Ken (93). All found notes that rounded and complicated the citrus: the brown sugar for John, caramel for Ken, Concord grape for Jen. Jen was most enthusiastic and explicit about what this coffee brought to three parts milk: “tasted like cherry pie.” A nicely balanced version of the new American style of espresso: bright but not too bright, naturally sweet, citrusy but roundly and ripely so.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. 	Sweet, balanced, engagingly layered. Driven by sweet ripe citrus—co-taster John DiRuocco (92) associated it with orange, Jen Apodaca (93) with tangerine, Ken (93) with sweet grapefruit—and intriguing floral/herbal notes: Jen wild fennel, Ken lavender. Everyone was particularly impressed with a general resonant complexity and balance in flavor and finish. Jen felt the sample faded a bit in three parts milk, but Ken and John read continued quiet intrigue, especially Ken, who found delicate grapefruit and chocolate.
desc_3: A classically sweet, citrusy cup with quietly intricate complications, particularly incense-toned herb and floral notes.
text: Evaluated as espresso. 	Sweet, balanced, engagingly layered. Driven by sweet ripe citrus—co-taster John DiRuocco (92) associated it with orange, Jen Apodaca (93) with tangerine, Ken (93) with sweet grapefruit—and intriguing floral/herbal notes: Jen wild fennel, Ken lavender. Everyone was particularly impressed with a general resonant complexity and balance in flavor and finish. Jen felt the sample faded a bit in three parts milk, but Ken and John read continued quiet intrigue, especially Ken, who found delicate grapefruit and chocolate. A classically sweet, citrusy cup with quietly intricate complications, particularly incense-toned herb and floral notes.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. An engagingly exotic coffee that polarized the three reviewers: John DiRuocco was lukewarm at 90, whereas Jen Apodaca was very enthusiastic at 95; Ken landed in the middle at 93. Ken read the coffee as driven by an attractive sweet ferment that for him suggested winey grape edging on grappa; John cited a fruit that for him was simultaneously ripe, tart and spicy; Jen went entirely positive on the fruit notes, citing in particular mango and passion fruit – fruit that taken together perhaps echoes John’s lush, tart and spicy reading. The cup was intense for John but not entirely coherent, while Jen found it expressed a “nice balance of acidity and sweetness.” Everyone found the coffee attractively complex in three parts milk, simultaneously lushly sweet and tart.
desc_3: An intriguing espresso, with a dynamic, wide-ranging intensity that probably derives in part from a mild, sweet fruit ferment. Adventurers welcome, classicists beware.
text: Evaluated as espresso. An engagingly exotic coffee that polarized the three reviewers: John DiRuocco was lukewarm at 90, whereas Jen Apodaca was very enthusiastic at 95; Ken landed in the middle at 93. Ken read the coffee as driven by an attractive sweet ferment that for him suggested winey grape edging on grappa; John cited a fruit that for him was simultaneously ripe, tart and spicy; Jen went entirely positive on the fruit notes, citing in particular mango and passion fruit – fruit that taken together perhaps echoes John’s lush, tart and spicy reading. The cup was intense for John but not entirely coherent, while Jen found it expressed a “nice balance of acidity and sweetness.” Everyone found the coffee attractively complex in three parts milk, simultaneously lushly sweet and tart. An intriguing espresso, with a dynamic, wide-ranging intensity that probably derives in part from a mild, sweet fruit ferment. Adventurers welcome, classicists beware.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Sturdy, balanced, chocolaty. All three reviewers (John DiRuocco 92, Jen Apodaca 94, Ken 92) cited caramel and chocolate; two read a particularly sweet orange (Ken called it orange marmalade). A “chocolate bomb” for John in three parts milk; for Ken the chocolate continued ripely orange-toned.
desc_3: A darkish medium roast develops the chocolate and caramel in this solid, accessible espresso.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Sturdy, balanced, chocolaty. All three reviewers (John DiRuocco 92, Jen Apodaca 94, Ken 92) cited caramel and chocolate; two read a particularly sweet orange (Ken called it orange marmalade). A “chocolate bomb” for John in three parts milk; for Ken the chocolate continued ripely orange-toned. A darkish medium roast develops the chocolate and caramel in this solid, accessible espresso.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Clean, sweet, gently tart, honey-toned. All three reviewers were impressed by the clean, sweet balance of this espresso, delivering almost identical scores: John DiRuocco 92, Jen Apodaca 93, Ken 92. Honey figured in everyone’s descriptors; Ken and John also found berry and a backgrounded cocoa butter. Citrusy in three parts milk, with an enveloping chocolate. “I could drink this every day,” Jen added.
desc_3: A classic espresso in the new-American, lighter-roasted style, sweet and honey-toned, softly bright.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Clean, sweet, gently tart, honey-toned. All three reviewers were impressed by the clean, sweet balance of this espresso, delivering almost identical scores: John DiRuocco 92, Jen Apodaca 93, Ken 92. Honey figured in everyone’s descriptors; Ken and John also found berry and a backgrounded cocoa butter. Citrusy in three parts milk, with an enveloping chocolate. “I could drink this every day,” Jen added. A classic espresso in the new-American, lighter-roasted style, sweet and honey-toned, softly bright.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Reviewer Jen Apodaca (95) loved this coffee: “rosewater, Meyer lemon, peach preserves, honey and brown sugar … Sweet and aromatic from start to finish … a standout in milk.” John DiRuocco (91) was less enthusiastic, though he praised this coffee’s delicacy and raisin and sweet chocolate notes. Ken found enough to like (blood orange, rose-like flowers, sweet pipe tobacco) to squeeze out a 90. All three reviewers found what they liked most about the coffee carrying into three parts milk.
desc_3: An espresso original and provocative enough in its sweet, shifty floral and fruit notes to mildly polarize three experienced tasters. Try it and see for yourself.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Reviewer Jen Apodaca (95) loved this coffee: “rosewater, Meyer lemon, peach preserves, honey and brown sugar … Sweet and aromatic from start to finish … a standout in milk.” John DiRuocco (91) was less enthusiastic, though he praised this coffee’s delicacy and raisin and sweet chocolate notes. Ken found enough to like (blood orange, rose-like flowers, sweet pipe tobacco) to squeeze out a 90. All three reviewers found what they liked most about the coffee carrying into three parts milk. An espresso original and provocative enough in its sweet, shifty floral and fruit notes to mildly polarize three experienced tasters. Try it and see for yourself.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Of three reviewers, Ken (93) was most supportive of this crisply chocolaty, silky-bodied espresso, citing its balanced range of baker’s chocolate, flowers and fruit. Jen Apodaca’s (92) descriptors overlapped Ken’s. For John DiRuocco (89), however, the sample was “a bit bipolar,” lacking coherence, although he praised the baker’s chocolate and pleasing mouthfeel. Everyone liked this one in three-parts milk, which help the chocolate sweeten and blossom.
desc_3: Those who value a crisp dry chocolate with a floral edge should particularly enjoy this coffee, which may owe its dry chocolate and flowers to the heirloom Bourbon-variety trees that produced it.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Of three reviewers, Ken (93) was most supportive of this crisply chocolaty, silky-bodied espresso, citing its balanced range of baker’s chocolate, flowers and fruit. Jen Apodaca’s (92) descriptors overlapped Ken’s. For John DiRuocco (89), however, the sample was “a bit bipolar,” lacking coherence, although he praised the baker’s chocolate and pleasing mouthfeel. Everyone liked this one in three-parts milk, which help the chocolate sweeten and blossom. Those who value a crisp dry chocolate with a floral edge should particularly enjoy this coffee, which may owe its dry chocolate and flowers to the heirloom Bourbon-variety trees that produced it.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Of three reviewers, John DiRuocco (95) most admired this crisp, floral-toned espresso: “complex and complete … floral, red fruit and stone fruit flavors … the body … light but sufficient, the finish clean and resonating.” Jen Apodaca (89) was considerably less enthusiastic and more terse: “There was a lot going on in this espresso … it finished like a dry red cabernet.” For Ken (91) this coffee represented a certain style of dried-in-the-fruit coffee: bittersweet, intriguingly anise- and lavender-toned, yet not quite sweet and fat enough for him.
desc_3: The natural or dried-in-the-fruit processing here nets a crisp floral, anise and stone-fruit profile rather than the lusher tropical fruit profile we often associate with natural-processed coffees. If the crisp floral fruit notion sounds good to you, you may find yourself weighing in with John DiRuocco’s 95 on this one.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Of three reviewers, John DiRuocco (95) most admired this crisp, floral-toned espresso: “complex and complete … floral, red fruit and stone fruit flavors … the body … light but sufficient, the finish clean and resonating.” Jen Apodaca (89) was considerably less enthusiastic and more terse: “There was a lot going on in this espresso … it finished like a dry red cabernet.” For Ken (91) this coffee represented a certain style of dried-in-the-fruit coffee: bittersweet, intriguingly anise- and lavender-toned, yet not quite sweet and fat enough for him. The natural or dried-in-the-fruit processing here nets a crisp floral, anise and stone-fruit profile rather than the lusher tropical fruit profile we often associate with natural-processed coffees. If the crisp floral fruit notion sounds good to you, you may find yourself weighing in with John DiRuocco’s 95 on this one.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Complexly bright, citrus- and chocolate-toned. All three reviewers – Jen Apodaca (92), John DiRuocco (91) and Ken (91) – cited the dynamic, citrusy acidity, rounding chocolate, crisp floral hints and surprisingly full mouthfeel. Continued bright and briskly chocolaty in three parts milk.
desc_3: A bright, citrusy espresso nuanced with chocolate and a hint of lavender-like flowers.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Complexly bright, citrus- and chocolate-toned. All three reviewers – Jen Apodaca (92), John DiRuocco (91) and Ken (91) – cited the dynamic, citrusy acidity, rounding chocolate, crisp floral hints and surprisingly full mouthfeel. Continued bright and briskly chocolaty in three parts milk. A bright, citrusy espresso nuanced with chocolate and a hint of lavender-like flowers.

desc_1: Complex, deeply pungent, sweetly savory. Lavender, pink peppercorn, gooseberry, lemongrass, baker’s chocolate in aroma and cup. Juicy, sweet-tart acidity; lightly creamy mouthfeel. Cocoa and lavender tones lead in a resonant, flavor-saturated finish.
desc_3: A powerhouse, flavor-saturated, classic Kenya cup: bright, deep and juicy-sweet.
text: Complex, deeply pungent, sweetly savory. Lavender, pink peppercorn, gooseberry, lemongrass, baker’s chocolate in aroma and cup. Juicy, sweet-tart acidity; lightly creamy mouthfeel. Cocoa and lavender tones lead in a resonant, flavor-saturated finish. A powerhouse, flavor-saturated, classic Kenya cup: bright, deep and juicy-sweet.

desc_1: Very sweet, delicately lush. Brown sugar, white peach, lemon blossom, almond, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and cup. Balanced, crisp acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Crisp, sweetly drying aromatic wood dominates in the finish.
desc_3: A fine Yirgacheffe paradox: Crisp, delicate yet opulently sweet.
text: Very sweet, delicately lush. Brown sugar, white peach, lemon blossom, almond, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and cup. Balanced, crisp acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Crisp, sweetly drying aromatic wood dominates in the finish. A fine Yirgacheffe paradox: Crisp, delicate yet opulently sweet.

desc_1: Rich, intricate and layered. Lemon zest, roasted cacao nib, violet, mulberry, frankincense in aroma and cup. Delicately tart acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The crisp, richly drying finish is cocoa-toned, with hints of citrus.
desc_3: An elegant washed Sidamo cup, both deeply sweet and delicately tart.
text: Rich, intricate and layered. Lemon zest, roasted cacao nib, violet, mulberry, frankincense in aroma and cup. Delicately tart acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The crisp, richly drying finish is cocoa-toned, with hints of citrus. An elegant washed Sidamo cup, both deeply sweet and delicately tart.

desc_1: Sweet, crisp, deeply floral. Wisteria, dried mango, blood orange, almond butter, clove in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy-tart acidity; silky-smooth mouthfeel. The crisp, clean, deeply flavor-saturated finish is sustained and resonant.
desc_3: An impeccable natural-processed Gesha: sweetly tart, complete in structure, with levitating fruit and flower notes and a seemingly infinite finish.
text: Sweet, crisp, deeply floral. Wisteria, dried mango, blood orange, almond butter, clove in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy-tart acidity; silky-smooth mouthfeel. The crisp, clean, deeply flavor-saturated finish is sustained and resonant. An impeccable natural-processed Gesha: sweetly tart, complete in structure, with levitating fruit and flower notes and a seemingly infinite finish.

desc_1: Rich, intricately layered, deeply and sweetly floral. Jasmine and violet, pineapple guava, baker’s chocolate, frankincense in aroma and cup. Crisp, effervescent acidity; lightly plush, lively mouthfeel. Flavor consolidates around flowers and crisp chocolate in a finish that rings on and on.
desc_3: Both balanced and deeply complex, elegant and exotic, a fine and utterly satisfying Yirgacheffe.
text: Rich, intricately layered, deeply and sweetly floral. Jasmine and violet, pineapple guava, baker’s chocolate, frankincense in aroma and cup. Crisp, effervescent acidity; lightly plush, lively mouthfeel. Flavor consolidates around flowers and crisp chocolate in a finish that rings on and on. Both balanced and deeply complex, elegant and exotic, a fine and utterly satisfying Yirgacheffe.

desc_1: Delicate, intricate, deeply sweet. Butterscotch, papaya, roasted cacao nib, plumeria-like flowers, myrrh in aroma and cup. Juicy, rich acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Butterscotch notes carry the resonant short finish, with hints of plumeria around the edges and a crisply inviting myrrh suggestion in the long.
desc_3: A crisp, sweetly floral Kenya cup with an extra aromatic lift from delicate hints of myrrh.
text: Delicate, intricate, deeply sweet. Butterscotch, papaya, roasted cacao nib, plumeria-like flowers, myrrh in aroma and cup. Juicy, rich acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Butterscotch notes carry the resonant short finish, with hints of plumeria around the edges and a crisply inviting myrrh suggestion in the long. A crisp, sweetly floral Kenya cup with an extra aromatic lift from delicate hints of myrrh.

desc_1: Layered, richly sweet. Dried mango, sandalwood, pink peppercorn, rhododendron, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Delicately tart acidity; lush, satiny mouthfeel. The finish is crisp with sandalwood and pink peppercorn notes in the short, while cocoa tones return in the long.
desc_3: An invitingly complex, sweetly spice-toned Colombia cup bookended by rich notes of roasted cacao nib.
text: Layered, richly sweet. Dried mango, sandalwood, pink peppercorn, rhododendron, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Delicately tart acidity; lush, satiny mouthfeel. The finish is crisp with sandalwood and pink peppercorn notes in the short, while cocoa tones return in the long. An invitingly complex, sweetly spice-toned Colombia cup bookended by rich notes of roasted cacao nib.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Sweet-toned, balanced, smooth. Cedar, ripe fig, carob, narcissus-like flowers in aroma and small cup. Syrupy mouthfeel; richly drying finish. In three parts milk crisp fig-toned chocolate dominates, with a continuing hint of flowers.
desc_3: This smooth, subtly pungent espresso nicely rides a richly fig-toned chocolate from aroma through milk.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Sweet-toned, balanced, smooth. Cedar, ripe fig, carob, narcissus-like flowers in aroma and small cup. Syrupy mouthfeel; richly drying finish. In three parts milk crisp fig-toned chocolate dominates, with a continuing hint of flowers. This smooth, subtly pungent espresso nicely rides a richly fig-toned chocolate from aroma through milk.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly roasty, balanced. Cocoa powder, fresh-cut oak, orange zest, roasted almond, lily-like flowers in aroma and small cup. Full though rather heavy mouthfeel. Flavor consolidates to cocoa and almond in the roast-toned finish. In three parts milk, the zesty orange dominates, rounded by continued cocoa and nut.
desc_3: An inviting espresso for those who prefer tactfully roasted, sweet-toned darker roasts. Particularly attractive in milk, which rounds the zesty orange and sweetens the roasty chocolate.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly roasty, balanced. Cocoa powder, fresh-cut oak, orange zest, roasted almond, lily-like flowers in aroma and small cup. Full though rather heavy mouthfeel. Flavor consolidates to cocoa and almond in the roast-toned finish. In three parts milk, the zesty orange dominates, rounded by continued cocoa and nut. An inviting espresso for those who prefer tactfully roasted, sweet-toned darker roasts. Particularly attractive in milk, which rounds the zesty orange and sweetens the roasty chocolate.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly tart, pungent. Dried apricot, fir, hazelnut, gardenia, orange zest in aroma and small cup. Lightly juicy, satiny mouthfeel. The tart finish is complicated by apricot notes and fresh-cut fir. Hazelnut, orange zest and gardenia all carry persuasively into three parts milk.
desc_3: Leads with a tart brightness nicely softened by sweet floral undertones, especially in milk.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly tart, pungent. Dried apricot, fir, hazelnut, gardenia, orange zest in aroma and small cup. Lightly juicy, satiny mouthfeel. The tart finish is complicated by apricot notes and fresh-cut fir. Hazelnut, orange zest and gardenia all carry persuasively into three parts milk. Leads with a tart brightness nicely softened by sweet floral undertones, especially in milk.

desc_1: Deeply rich, sweet-toned. Jasmine, dried mango, sandalwood, orange zest, chocolate fudge in aroma and cup. Gentle, crisp acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. The finish consolidates to dried mango and cocoa-toned sandalwood notes.
desc_3: A pretty washed-process Ethiopia coffee characterized by dried fruit and chocolate notes throughout.
text: Deeply rich, sweet-toned. Jasmine, dried mango, sandalwood, orange zest, chocolate fudge in aroma and cup. Gentle, crisp acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. The finish consolidates to dried mango and cocoa-toned sandalwood notes. A pretty washed-process Ethiopia coffee characterized by dried fruit and chocolate notes throughout.

desc_1: Deeply sweet, fruit-forward. Dried raspberry, apple brandy, freesia-like flowers, roasted cacao nib, molasses in aroma and cup. Crisp, sweet-tart acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Raspberry tones ring from the break through to the quietly resonant finish, with a supporting array of spicy florals.
desc_3: Spicy-sweet flowers and fruit drive this pretty, natural-processed Costa Rica.
text: Deeply sweet, fruit-forward. Dried raspberry, apple brandy, freesia-like flowers, roasted cacao nib, molasses in aroma and cup. Crisp, sweet-tart acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Raspberry tones ring from the break through to the quietly resonant finish, with a supporting array of spicy florals. Spicy-sweet flowers and fruit drive this pretty, natural-processed Costa Rica.

desc_1: Intensely rich, deeply sweet. Halvah, cedar, rhododendron, lime zest, fresh pipe tobacco in aroma and cup. Sweet-savory acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The gently drying finish centers around sandalwood and pipe tobacco.
desc_3: A journey through sweet, vanilla-toned florals to zesty citrus that concludes in aromatic wood and tobacco—a wild and interesting ride.
text: Intensely rich, deeply sweet. Halvah, cedar, rhododendron, lime zest, fresh pipe tobacco in aroma and cup. Sweet-savory acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The gently drying finish centers around sandalwood and pipe tobacco. A journey through sweet, vanilla-toned florals to zesty citrus that concludes in aromatic wood and tobacco—a wild and interesting ride.

desc_1: Engaging, fruit-forward. Pink grapefruit zest, apricot, baker’s chocolate, magnolia-like flowers, licorice bark in aroma and cup. Juicy, brisk acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. The richly drying finish is carried by dried fruit and licorice suggestions in the short, with a hint of magnolia returning in the long.
desc_3: A crisp, clean, appealingly fruit-toned natural-processed Yirgacheffe cup.
text: Engaging, fruit-forward. Pink grapefruit zest, apricot, baker’s chocolate, magnolia-like flowers, licorice bark in aroma and cup. Juicy, brisk acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. The richly drying finish is carried by dried fruit and licorice suggestions in the short, with a hint of magnolia returning in the long. A crisp, clean, appealingly fruit-toned natural-processed Yirgacheffe cup.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Lively, complex, deeply expressive. Red currant, wisteria, hazelnut butter, lemon zest, chocolate fudge in aroma and small cup. Full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel; crisp cocoa- and citrus-toned finish. Chocolate fudge leads in three parts milk, complicated by continued floral resonance.
desc_3: A balanced, exciting, zesty-sweet and enchantingly floral espresso blend.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Lively, complex, deeply expressive. Red currant, wisteria, hazelnut butter, lemon zest, chocolate fudge in aroma and small cup. Full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel; crisp cocoa- and citrus-toned finish. Chocolate fudge leads in three parts milk, complicated by continued floral resonance. A balanced, exciting, zesty-sweet and enchantingly floral espresso blend.

origin: Holualoa, North Kona growing district, “Big Island” of Hawaii
desc_1: Lush, sweetly savory, deeply floral. Black currant, hops, coriander, kola syrup, violet in aroma and cup. Juicy, round acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. The flavor-saturated finish consolidates around fruit and floral tones in the short, modulating to crisp, resonant notes of hops and kola in the long.
desc_3: A stellar representation of the much-admired SL-28 coffee variety—crisp yet lush, powerful—and one of our highest-rated coffees this year.
text: Lush, sweetly savory, deeply floral. Black currant, hops, coriander, kola syrup, violet in aroma and cup. Juicy, round acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. The flavor-saturated finish consolidates around fruit and floral tones in the short, modulating to crisp, resonant notes of hops and kola in the long. A stellar representation of the much-admired SL-28 coffee variety—crisp yet lush, powerful—and one of our highest-rated coffees this year.

desc_1: Deeply sweet, richly pungent. Dried raspberry, sandalwood, honeysuckle, vanilla, tangerine zest in aroma and cup. Quietly juicy acidity; satiny mouthfeel. The fruit-driven finish centers around dried raspberry notes in the short, which round to gentle sandalwood and vanilla in the long.
desc_3: A powerfully aromatic, berry-toned natural-process coffee that finishes saturated with a particularly sweet, fragrant sandalwood.
text: Deeply sweet, richly pungent. Dried raspberry, sandalwood, honeysuckle, vanilla, tangerine zest in aroma and cup. Quietly juicy acidity; satiny mouthfeel. The fruit-driven finish centers around dried raspberry notes in the short, which round to gentle sandalwood and vanilla in the long. A powerfully aromatic, berry-toned natural-process coffee that finishes saturated with a particularly sweet, fragrant sandalwood.

desc_1: Sweet-toned, delicately rich. Maple syrup, ripe persimmon, orange zest, roasted cacao nib, gardenia-like flowers in aroma and cup. Juicy, balanced acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The rich-toned finish is saturated with crisp cacao nib and deep orange zest notes.
desc_3: A zesty, sweet, inviting blend of coffee varieties that includes the rare and prized Gesha.
text: Sweet-toned, delicately rich. Maple syrup, ripe persimmon, orange zest, roasted cacao nib, gardenia-like flowers in aroma and cup. Juicy, balanced acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The rich-toned finish is saturated with crisp cacao nib and deep orange zest notes. A zesty, sweet, inviting blend of coffee varieties that includes the rare and prized Gesha.

origin: Sidama (also Sidamo) growing region, southern Ethiopia
desc_1: Vastly rich, fruit-forward. Blueberry, cedar, candied grapefruit zest, violet-like flowers, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Vibrant, lightly juicy acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The crisp, sweetly tart finish consolidates to a cedar-toned grapefruit zest with a hint of pink peppercorn.
desc_3: A sweetly fruit-toned, spicy-tart Ethiopia cup.
text: Vastly rich, fruit-forward. Blueberry, cedar, candied grapefruit zest, violet-like flowers, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Vibrant, lightly juicy acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The crisp, sweetly tart finish consolidates to a cedar-toned grapefruit zest with a hint of pink peppercorn. A sweetly fruit-toned, spicy-tart Ethiopia cup.

desc_1: Delicately sweet, intricate. Butterscotch, almond butter, orange zest, vanilla, honeydew melon in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart, quietly balanced acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. The gently drying finish consolidates around almond and butterscotch.
desc_3: A classic El Salvador cup: gently and sweetly tart, plush, balanced, with a rich, nut-toned butterscotch sweetness.
text: Delicately sweet, intricate. Butterscotch, almond butter, orange zest, vanilla, honeydew melon in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart, quietly balanced acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. The gently drying finish consolidates around almond and butterscotch.  A classic El Salvador cup: gently and sweetly tart, plush, balanced, with a rich, nut-toned butterscotch sweetness.

desc_1: Sweet, spicy, nut-toned. Pecan, carob, clove, black currant, lantana-like flowers in aroma and cup. Lively, juicy-tart acidity; delicate silky-smooth mouthfeel. The gently drying finish is carried by pecan notes in the short; black currant and clove return in the long.
desc_3: A gently aromatic coffee that sings in the bright, balanced acidity and levitating mouthfeel.
text: Sweet, spicy, nut-toned. Pecan, carob, clove, black currant, lantana-like flowers in aroma and cup. Lively, juicy-tart acidity; delicate silky-smooth mouthfeel. The gently drying finish is carried by pecan notes in the short; black currant and clove return in the long. A gently aromatic coffee that sings in the bright, balanced acidity and levitating mouthfeel.

desc_1: Deeply pungent, richly sweet-savory. Pink grapefruit zest, cashew, red currant, butterscotch, fine musk in aroma and cup. Intense, crisp but juicy acidity; delicate, silky-smooth mouthfeel. The finish consolidates around floral-toned musk notes in the short while an attractive new element, coconut, emerges in the long.
desc_3: A complex Kenya with a bold, confident structure and an exotic combination of flavor notes; a particularly compelling choice for afternoon rejuvenation.
text: Deeply pungent, richly sweet-savory. Pink grapefruit zest, cashew, red currant, butterscotch, fine musk in aroma and cup. Intense, crisp but juicy acidity; delicate, silky-smooth mouthfeel. The finish consolidates around floral-toned musk notes in the short while an attractive new element, coconut, emerges in the long. A complex Kenya with a bold, confident structure and an exotic combination of flavor notes; a particularly compelling choice for afternoon rejuvenation.

desc_1: Complexly layered with great sweetness. Ginger flower, mangosteen, frankincense, lemon zest, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Vibrant, intricate acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. The rich, resonant finish is carried by rich, cocoa-toned florals and deep, sweet fruit notes.
desc_3: A beautifully balanced and complete wet-processed Yirgacheffe cup, lyrical in structure and sweetly inviting from aroma to finish.
text: Complexly layered with great sweetness. Ginger flower, mangosteen, frankincense, lemon zest, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Vibrant, intricate acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. The rich, resonant finish is carried by rich, cocoa-toned florals and deep, sweet fruit notes. A beautifully balanced and complete wet-processed Yirgacheffe cup, lyrical in structure and sweetly inviting from aroma to finish.

desc_1: Quietly rich, harmoniously sweet. Caramel, green grape, rhododendron, baker’s chocolate, walnut in aroma and cup. Crisp, sweet acidity; satiny mouthfeel. The richly drying finish consolidates around chocolate and walnut.
desc_3: A pretty, caramel-toned cup for those who like their coffees crisp and chocolaty.
text: Quietly rich, harmoniously sweet. Caramel, green grape, rhododendron, baker’s chocolate, walnut in aroma and cup. Crisp, sweet acidity; satiny mouthfeel. The richly drying finish consolidates around chocolate and walnut. A pretty, caramel-toned cup for those who like their coffees crisp and chocolaty.

desc_1: Dark chocolate, almond, vanilla, dried apricot, mesquite in aroma and cup. Gentle, balanced acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. The gently drying finish consolidates to chocolate and dried apricot.
desc_3: Successfully roasted to a profile just a bit darker than the usual medium, netting an intense, flavor-saturated cup.
text: Dark chocolate, almond, vanilla, dried apricot, mesquite in aroma and cup. Gentle, balanced acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. The gently drying finish consolidates to chocolate and dried apricot. Successfully roasted to a profile just a bit darker than the usual medium, netting an intense, flavor-saturated cup.

desc_1: Lively, sweetly floral. Peach, honeysuckle, almond, roasted cacao nib, orange zest in aroma and cup. Round, lightly juicy acidity; lean though satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The gently drying finish leads with honeysuckle in the short, following with crisp almond and cocoa tones in the long.
desc_3: An appealing cup for those who like sweet florals up front and a refreshingly crisp finish.
text: Lively, sweetly floral. Peach, honeysuckle, almond, roasted cacao nib, orange zest in aroma and cup. Round, lightly juicy acidity; lean though satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The gently drying finish leads with honeysuckle in the short, following with crisp almond and cocoa tones in the long. An appealing cup for those who like sweet florals up front and a refreshingly crisp finish.

desc_1: Subtly complex, sweetly nut-toned. Almond, caramel, gardenia, tangerine zest, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Lively sweet-tart acidity; satiny mouthfeel. The resonant finish consolidates around caramel and almond tones.
desc_3: An elegant, balanced cup with particularly compelling acidity: bright, lively, juicy. We would have rated this vivacious coffee one point higher had the cups not been slightly uneven.
text: Subtly complex, sweetly nut-toned. Almond, caramel, gardenia, tangerine zest, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Lively sweet-tart acidity; satiny mouthfeel. The resonant finish consolidates around caramel and almond tones. An elegant, balanced cup with particularly compelling acidity: bright, lively, juicy. We would have rated this vivacious coffee one point higher had the cups not been slightly uneven.

desc_1: Refined, richly complex. Spice box, cocoa powder, lemon zest, pineapple guava, walnut in aroma and cup. Gentle, backgrounded acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. The rich-toned, flavor-saturated finish is redolent of spice box and lemon zest in the short, with cocoa-toned walnut lingering in the long.
desc_3: An unusual cup from an unusual variety of Arabica: gentle acidity with a particularly long, resonant finish.
text: Refined, richly complex. Spice box, cocoa powder, lemon zest, pineapple guava, walnut in aroma and cup. Gentle, backgrounded acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. The rich-toned, flavor-saturated finish is redolent of spice box and lemon zest in the short, with cocoa-toned walnut lingering in the long. An unusual cup from an unusual variety of Arabica: gentle acidity with a particularly long, resonant finish.

desc_1: Delicate but deep, fruit-forward. Raspberry, violet, blood orange zest, liquorice, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Juicy, vibrant acidity; lean but silky mouthfeel. The flavor-saturated finish consolidates to blood orange zest and roasted cacao nib.
desc_3: An impressive cocoa- and fruit-toned, sweetly rich cup.
text: Delicate but deep, fruit-forward. Raspberry, violet, blood orange zest, liquorice, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Juicy, vibrant acidity; lean but silky mouthfeel. The flavor-saturated finish consolidates to blood orange zest and roasted cacao nib.  An impressive cocoa- and fruit-toned, sweetly rich cup.

desc_1: Resonant, deeply sweet, engaging. Chocolate fudge, hazelnut, jasmine, honey, oak in aroma and cup. Bright, zesty acidity; plush, lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The rich, round finish is flavor-saturated, all the notes carrying into the short then consolidating to a nut-toned chocolate in the long.
desc_3: A confident, lively, sweet-toned Costa Rica cup that leads with deeply nuanced chocolate.
text: Resonant, deeply sweet, engaging. Chocolate fudge, hazelnut, jasmine, honey, oak in aroma and cup. Bright, zesty acidity; plush, lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The rich, round finish is flavor-saturated, all the notes carrying into the short then consolidating to a nut-toned chocolate in the long. A confident, lively, sweet-toned Costa Rica cup that leads with deeply nuanced chocolate.

desc_1: Rich, sweetly spicy. Black cherry, spice box, tamarind, oak, lantana-like flowers in aroma and cup. Juicy, lively acidity; syrupy mouthfeel. The sweet, resonant finish centers around deep black cherry in the short complicated by spicy oak and sweet-tart tamarind in the long.
desc_3: An original cup: spicy, sweetly tart, balanced.
text: Rich, sweetly spicy. Black cherry, spice box, tamarind, oak, lantana-like flowers in aroma and cup. Juicy, lively acidity; syrupy mouthfeel. The sweet, resonant finish centers around deep black cherry in the short complicated by spicy oak and sweet-tart tamarind in the long.  An original cup: spicy, sweetly tart, balanced.

desc_1: Deeply sweet, delicately rich. Maple syrup, freesia-like flowers, green grape, hazelnut, cedar in aroma and cup. Delicate, sweetly tart acidity; velvety mouthfeel. The balanced, sweet-toned finish consolidates to maple syrup, cedar and hazelnut.
desc_3: A delicate, sweet cup centered around spicy floral notes and rich, nut-toned aromatic wood: refined and understated.
text: Deeply sweet, delicately rich. Maple syrup, freesia-like flowers, green grape, hazelnut, cedar in aroma and cup. Delicate, sweetly tart acidity; velvety mouthfeel. The balanced, sweet-toned finish consolidates to maple syrup, cedar and hazelnut. A delicate, sweet cup centered around spicy floral notes and rich, nut-toned aromatic wood: refined and understated.

desc_1: Subtly direct, sweet-toned. Blueberry, lavender, myrrh, baker’s chocolate, candied orange zest in aroma and cup. Round, balanced acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The richly drying finish is saturated with sweetly exotic notes of lavender and myrrh.
desc_3: An elegantly rich, floral- and fruit-toned dried-in-the-fruit Costa Rica cup.
text: Subtly direct, sweet-toned. Blueberry, lavender, myrrh, baker’s chocolate, candied orange zest in aroma and cup. Round, balanced acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The richly drying finish is saturated with sweetly exotic notes of lavender and myrrh. An elegantly rich, floral- and fruit-toned dried-in-the-fruit Costa Rica cup.

desc_1: Delicately rich, with a hint of sweet ferment. Dried blueberry, rum cordial, tamarind, elderflower, a hint of cumin in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet-tart acidity; buoyant, satiny mouthfeel. The crisp, gently drying finish is carried by notes of elderflower and tamarind.
desc_3: An inviting natural-processed cup, with a whisper of sweet ferment suggesting rum cordial.
text: Delicately rich, with a hint of sweet ferment. Dried blueberry, rum cordial, tamarind, elderflower, a hint of cumin in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet-tart acidity; buoyant, satiny mouthfeel. The crisp, gently drying finish is carried by notes of elderflower and tamarind. An inviting natural-processed cup, with a whisper of sweet ferment suggesting rum cordial.

desc_1: Invitingly sweet, richly composed. Candied papaya, Brazil nut, lilac, sarsparilla, dark chocolate in aroma and cup. Juicy, sweet-tart acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. The crisp, gently drying finish consolidates to nut-toned chocolate.
desc_3: A paradoxical dried-in-the-fruit cup, as delicately tart as it is deeply sweet and fruit-driven.
text: Invitingly sweet, richly composed. Candied papaya, Brazil nut, lilac, sarsparilla, dark chocolate in aroma and cup. Juicy, sweet-tart acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. The crisp, gently drying finish consolidates to nut-toned chocolate. A paradoxical dried-in-the-fruit cup, as delicately tart as it is deeply sweet and fruit-driven.

desc_1: Delicate, subtly sweet. Dried honeysuckle, cocoa powder, elm, baked apple, almond in aroma and cup. Soft, gentle acidity; full, creamy mouthfeel. The mild, quiet finish is carried by cocoa and nut tones.
desc_3: A classic washed-style Costa Rica cup: sweet-toned, subtle, balanced. Enjoy it with any sweet pastry accompaniment.
text: Delicate, subtly sweet. Dried honeysuckle, cocoa powder, elm, baked apple, almond in aroma and cup. Soft, gentle acidity; full, creamy mouthfeel. The mild, quiet finish is carried by cocoa and nut tones. A classic washed-style Costa Rica cup: sweet-toned, subtle, balanced. Enjoy it with any sweet pastry accompaniment.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Extravagant, intricate, yet balanced. Strawberry guava, tangerine zest, lilac-like flowers, sandalwood, roasted cacao nib in aroma and small cup. Velvety and honeyish in mouthfeel. Deeply fruit-toned and sweet in the finish. Superb in three-parts milk: juicy, fruit-toned, chocolaty.
desc_3: Espressos, particularly single-origin espressos, don’t get much better than this one, seething with fruit, floral and incense-like nuance yet delicately balanced and complete.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Extravagant, intricate, yet balanced. Strawberry guava, tangerine zest, lilac-like flowers, sandalwood, roasted cacao nib in aroma and small cup. Velvety and honeyish in mouthfeel. Deeply fruit-toned and sweet in the finish. Superb in three-parts milk: juicy, fruit-toned, chocolaty. Espressos, particularly single-origin espressos, don’t get much better than this one, seething with fruit, floral and incense-like nuance yet delicately balanced and complete.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Dynamic yet balanced. Jasmine, chocolate, banana, tangerine zest, sandalwood in aroma and small cup. Lightly full, velvety mouthfeel; clean, round finish. Floral top notes shimmer atop deeply rich chocolate in three parts milk.
desc_3: A balanced but intricate blend, impressive in its layered, subtle complexity.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Dynamic yet balanced. Jasmine, chocolate, banana, tangerine zest, sandalwood in aroma and small cup. Lightly full, velvety mouthfeel; clean, round finish. Floral top notes shimmer atop deeply rich chocolate in three parts milk. A balanced but intricate blend, impressive in its layered, subtle complexity.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Balanced, delicately and sweetly tart. Peach, orange zest, lavender, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and small cup. Lightly but buoyantly syrupy mouthfeel; gently tart, drying, lavender-toned finish. Three parts milk both round the fruit toward chocolate while paradoxically emphasizing the blend’s bright, zesty character.
desc_3: Delicate, zesty fruit and crisp lavender energize a vivacious but delicately balanced blend.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Balanced, delicately and sweetly tart. Peach, orange zest, lavender, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and small cup. Lightly but buoyantly syrupy mouthfeel; gently tart, drying, lavender-toned finish. Three parts milk both round the fruit toward chocolate while paradoxically emphasizing the blend’s bright, zesty character. Delicate, zesty fruit and crisp lavender energize a vivacious but delicately balanced blend.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly bright; zesty. Grapefruit, cedar, baker’s chocolate, candied pecan, orange blossom in aroma and small cup. Delicate, satiny mouthfeel; citrus and chocolate carry into a richly tart finish. Sweetly zesty and vivacious in three parts milk, with a rounding and softening chocolate influence.
desc_3: A bright and zesty espresso in the latest style, but with enough rounding chocolate, sweetness and balance to keep it accessible.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly bright; zesty. Grapefruit, cedar, baker’s chocolate, candied pecan, orange blossom in aroma and small cup. Delicate, satiny mouthfeel; citrus and chocolate carry into a richly tart finish. Sweetly zesty and vivacious in three parts milk, with a rounding and softening chocolate influence.  A bright and zesty espresso in the latest style, but with enough rounding chocolate, sweetness and balance to keep it accessible.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Rich, deep, roundly tart and slightly savory. Rum-toned dark chocolate, ripe orange, plum, oak, lavender top notes in aroma and small cup. Light but silky mouthfeel; deeply chocolaty, lightly drying mouthfeel. Authoritative, perhaps a bit blunt, in three parts milk: plum-like fruit, oaky dark chocolate.
desc_3: A very interesting tree variety and tactful dried-in-the-fruit processing produces a subtly original and resonant espresso.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Rich, deep, roundly tart and slightly savory. Rum-toned dark chocolate, ripe orange, plum, oak, lavender top notes in aroma and small cup. Light but silky mouthfeel; deeply chocolaty, lightly drying mouthfeel. Authoritative, perhaps a bit blunt, in three parts milk: plum-like fruit, oaky dark chocolate. A very interesting tree variety and tactful dried-in-the-fruit processing produces a subtly original and resonant espresso.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Balanced, round but crisp and savory-edged, lightly chocolaty. Plum jam, dark chocolate, hazelnut, cedar in aroma and small cup. Lightly syrupy mouthfeel; rich, crisply sweet-savory finish. A dry, nut-toned dark chocolate dominates nicely in three-parts milk, sweetening in the finish.
desc_3: References a rather traditional style of espresso, dry and sweetly savory, rich with baker’s chocolate, nut and jammy fruit.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Balanced, round but crisp and savory-edged, lightly chocolaty. Plum jam, dark chocolate, hazelnut, cedar in aroma and small cup. Lightly syrupy mouthfeel; rich, crisply sweet-savory finish. A dry, nut-toned dark chocolate dominates nicely in three-parts milk, sweetening in the finish. References a rather traditional style of espresso, dry and sweetly savory, rich with baker’s chocolate, nut and jammy fruit.

desc_1: Delicate, fruit-forward. Dried raspberry, lilac, dark chocolate, peppermint, oak in aroma and cup. Rich-toned, juicy acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. The clean, lightly resonant finish leads with dark chocolate and lilac notes in the short, resolving with a re-emergence of a sweetly spicy peppermint in the long.
desc_3: A delicate, harmonious, berry-toned natural-processed Yirgacheffe coffee.
text: Delicate, fruit-forward. Dried raspberry, lilac, dark chocolate, peppermint, oak in aroma and cup. Rich-toned, juicy acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. The clean, lightly resonant finish leads with dark chocolate and lilac notes in the short, resolving with a re-emergence of a sweetly spicy peppermint in the long.  A delicate, harmonious, berry-toned natural-processed Yirgacheffe coffee.

desc_1: Delicately and sweetly pungent. Jasmine, lemon zest, roasted cacao nib, frankincense, butterscotch in aroma and cup. Vibrant, lyrical acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The short finish leads with frankincense and cocoa, rounding to butterscotch in the long.
desc_3: An inviting Yirgacheffe with exotic spice and floral notes grounded in rich cocoa tones.
text: Delicately and sweetly pungent. Jasmine, lemon zest, roasted cacao nib, frankincense, butterscotch in aroma and cup. Vibrant, lyrical acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The short finish leads with frankincense and cocoa, rounding to butterscotch in the long. An inviting Yirgacheffe with exotic spice and floral notes grounded in rich cocoa tones.

desc_1: Crisp, delicate, richly sweet. Dried apricot, roasted cacao nib, freesia, redwood, roasted walnut in aroma and cup. Lively, sweet-tart acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. The quietly resonant finish leads with dried apricot and cocoa tones in the short, consolidating to sweetly crisp walnut in the long.
desc_3: A clean, elegant natural-processed Costa Rica cup with pretty cocoa, dried fruit and spicy floral notes.
text: Crisp, delicate, richly sweet. Dried apricot, roasted cacao nib, freesia, redwood, roasted walnut in aroma and cup. Lively, sweet-tart acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. The quietly resonant finish leads with dried apricot and cocoa tones in the short, consolidating to sweetly crisp walnut in the long. A clean, elegant natural-processed Costa Rica cup with pretty cocoa, dried fruit and spicy floral notes.

desc_1: Deeply sweet, enticingly rich. Peach, lime zest, almond, violet, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Sweet, juicy acidity; plush, velvety mouthfeel. The nuanced, resonant finish consolidates around peach and roasted cocoa nib.
desc_3: A fruit-driven, harmoniously balanced Ethiopia natural.
text: Deeply sweet, enticingly rich. Peach, lime zest, almond, violet, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Sweet, juicy acidity; plush, velvety mouthfeel. The nuanced, resonant finish consolidates around peach and roasted cocoa nib. A fruit-driven, harmoniously balanced Ethiopia natural.

desc_1: Sweet, softly crisp. Aromatic wood and flowers. Sandalwood, lavender, dried raspberry, cacao nib, ripe banana in aroma and cup. Gently zesty, floral-toned acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Flowers and sandalwood carry into a richly drying finish.
desc_3: This unusual dried-in-the-fruit coffee from an unusual origin was polarizing around the Coffee Review cupping table. One cupper felt the wood notes were none too aromatic and dominated; two others found the wood notes richly spicy and the floral notes overridingly complex and persuasive. Try it if you like the more incense-toned, spicier style of Ethiopia natural-processed coffees.
text: Sweet, softly crisp. Aromatic wood and flowers. Sandalwood, lavender, dried raspberry, cacao nib, ripe banana in aroma and cup. Gently zesty, floral-toned acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Flowers and sandalwood carry into a richly drying finish. This unusual dried-in-the-fruit coffee from an unusual origin was polarizing around the Coffee Review cupping table. One cupper felt the wood notes were none too aromatic and dominated; two others found the wood notes richly spicy and the floral notes overridingly complex and persuasive. Try it if you like the more incense-toned, spicier style of Ethiopia natural-processed coffees.

desc_1: Delicate; quietly intricate. Lemon verbena, almond blossom, fresh-cut cedar, raisin, anise in aroma and cup. Crisply sweet acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. The crisp, gently drying finish opens with citrus in the short, with anise and cedar in the long.
desc_3: A lively, delicate coffee with appealing citrus, dried fruit and spice notes and exemplary social and environmental credentials.
text: Delicate; quietly intricate. Lemon verbena, almond blossom, fresh-cut cedar, raisin, anise in aroma and cup. Crisply sweet acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. The crisp, gently drying finish opens with citrus in the short, with anise and cedar in the long. A lively, delicate coffee with appealing citrus, dried fruit and spice notes and exemplary social and environmental credentials.

desc_1: Quietly sweet, nut-toned. Dried apricot, almond, fresh-cut fir, cocoa powder, a hint of white pepper in aroma and cup. Brisk, balanced acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The crisp, gently drying finish centers on aromatic wood notes complicated by suggestions of cocoa and white pepper.
desc_3: A coffee from an underdog origin that will appeal to those who prefer round, sweet nut-tones and gently brisk rather than bright acidity.
text: Quietly sweet, nut-toned. Dried apricot, almond, fresh-cut fir, cocoa powder, a hint of white pepper in aroma and cup. Brisk, balanced acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The crisp, gently drying finish centers on aromatic wood notes complicated by suggestions of cocoa and white pepper.  A coffee from an underdog origin that will appeal to those who prefer round, sweet nut-tones and gently brisk rather than bright acidity.

desc_1: Complex, engaging, sweetly tart. Toffee, tamarind, violet, black truffle, dark chocolate in aroma and cup. Brisk, floral acidity; fudgy mouthfeel. Toffee notes, this coffee’s throughline, are accompanied by tamarind in the resonant short and dark chocolate in the sweet, crisp long.
desc_3: A compelling confluence of sweet, tart and floral notes, with a hint of umami intrigue in both the aroma and cup.
text: Complex, engaging, sweetly tart. Toffee, tamarind, violet, black truffle, dark chocolate in aroma and cup. Brisk, floral acidity; fudgy mouthfeel. Toffee notes, this coffee’s throughline, are accompanied by tamarind in the resonant short and dark chocolate in the sweet, crisp long. A compelling confluence of sweet, tart and floral notes, with a hint of umami intrigue in both the aroma and cup.

desc_1: Delicate, fruit-forward, deeply sweet. Blueberry, rhododendron, sandalwood, blood orange zest, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Sweet, lightly juicy mouthfeel; full, satiny mouthfeel. The gently drying finish consolidates to a cocoa-toned sandalwood.
desc_3: An intricate, delicately composed natural-processed Ethiopia, rife with berry and exotic aromatic wood notes.
text: Delicate, fruit-forward, deeply sweet. Blueberry, rhododendron, sandalwood, blood orange zest, roasted cacao nib in aroma and cup. Sweet, lightly juicy mouthfeel; full, satiny mouthfeel. The gently drying finish consolidates to a cocoa-toned sandalwood.  An intricate, delicately composed natural-processed Ethiopia, rife with berry and exotic aromatic wood notes.

desc_1: Crisply pungent, deeply sweet. Honey, jasmine, sandalwood, tangerine zest, a hint of myrrh in aroma and cup. Delicate but richly expressed acidity; silky mouthfeel. A cocoa suggestion surfaces in the quietly flavor-saturated short finish; jasmine and sandalwood last in the long.
desc_3: A natural-processed coffee without a hint of ferment, only a deep, honey-like sweetness and intricate floral and incense-like notes.
text: Crisply pungent, deeply sweet. Honey, jasmine, sandalwood, tangerine zest, a hint of myrrh in aroma and cup. Delicate but richly expressed acidity; silky mouthfeel. A cocoa suggestion surfaces in the quietly flavor-saturated short finish; jasmine and sandalwood last in the long.  A natural-processed coffee without a hint of ferment, only a deep, honey-like sweetness and intricate floral and incense-like notes.

desc_1: Intense, exotic, exhilarating. Moist, fresh-fallen leaves, ripe watermelon, blackberry, nut-toned chocolate, jasmine-like flowers, considerably more in aroma and cup. Pungent, juicy acidity; plushly soft mouthfeel. Deep, balanced, thoroughly flavor-saturated finish.
desc_3: Extraordinary Sumatra, finely structured and utterly original in its aromatics.
text: Intense, exotic, exhilarating. Moist, fresh-fallen leaves, ripe watermelon, blackberry, nut-toned chocolate, jasmine-like flowers, considerably more in aroma and cup. Pungent, juicy acidity; plushly soft mouthfeel. Deep, balanced, thoroughly flavor-saturated finish. Extraordinary Sumatra, finely structured and utterly original in its aromatics.

desc_1: Deeply rich, sweetly pungent. Black currant, wisteria, spicy oak, bergamot, vanilla in aroma and cup. Vibrant, sweetly tart acidity; full, velvety mouthfeel. The richly drying finish is high-toned, sweetly herbaceous, focused around bergamot and vanilla notes.
desc_3: A complex, resonant Kenya, saturated with lush flower, herb and fruit notes.
text: Deeply rich, sweetly pungent. Black currant, wisteria, spicy oak, bergamot, vanilla in aroma and cup. Vibrant, sweetly tart acidity; full, velvety mouthfeel. The richly drying finish is high-toned, sweetly herbaceous, focused around bergamot and vanilla notes.  A complex, resonant Kenya, saturated with lush flower, herb and fruit notes.

desc_1: Delicately intense, tropically sweet. Coconut, pistachio, sandalwood, plumeria, dried mango in aroma and cup. Balanced, juicy acidity. Round, plushly syrupy mouthfeel. The long, resonant finish is saturated with all of the flavor notes from the cup, in particular plumeria and coconut, which ring on and on.
desc_3: A levitating Kenya cup with flawless structure and extraordinary aromatics, lushly tropical, yet elegantly pure.
text: Delicately intense, tropically sweet. Coconut, pistachio, sandalwood, plumeria, dried mango in aroma and cup. Balanced, juicy acidity. Round, plushly syrupy mouthfeel. The long, resonant finish is saturated with all of the flavor notes from the cup, in particular plumeria and coconut, which ring on and on. A levitating Kenya cup with flawless structure and extraordinary aromatics, lushly tropical, yet elegantly pure.

desc_1: Big, intricate; vast but coherent. Black currant, vanilla, sandalwood, violet-like flowers, hints of chocolate and coconut, more in aroma and cup. Forceful but juicy sweet acidity; delicately syrupy mouthfeel. Sandalwood and coconut, in particular, resonate in a richly drying finish.
desc_3: An extraordinary Kenya, intense yet balanced and accessible.
text: Big, intricate; vast but coherent. Black currant, vanilla, sandalwood, violet-like flowers, hints of chocolate and coconut, more in aroma and cup. Forceful but juicy sweet acidity; delicately syrupy mouthfeel. Sandalwood and coconut, in particular, resonate in a richly drying finish.   An extraordinary Kenya, intense yet balanced and accessible.

desc_1: Profoundly sweet; cidery. Pear cider, baker’s chocolate, ripe banana, lemon zest, a hint of lush honeysuckle in aroma and cup. Round, juicy acidity; plush mouthfeel. Chocolate, banana and flowers carry into a resonant though drying finish.
desc_3: Deep, nuanced sweetness (ripe banana, honeysuckle) and a discreet tickle of cidery ferment envelop drier notes: baker’s chocolate, lemon zest. Fine variation on the fruit-forward naturals theme.
text: Profoundly sweet; cidery. Pear cider, baker’s chocolate, ripe banana, lemon zest, a hint of lush honeysuckle in aroma and cup. Round, juicy acidity; plush mouthfeel. Chocolate, banana and flowers carry into a resonant though drying finish.  Deep, nuanced sweetness (ripe banana, honeysuckle) and a discreet tickle of cidery ferment envelop drier notes: baker’s chocolate, lemon zest. Fine variation on the fruit-forward naturals theme.

desc_1: Delicately rich, deeply sweet. Toffee, mulberry, cedar, roasted cacao nib, rhododendron-like flowers in aroma and cup. Balanced, sweet-tart acidity; plush, buoyantly creamy mouthfeel. The crisply cocoa-toned finish is redolent of almond and rhododendron.
desc_3: A refined, balanced, sweetly tart Colombia cup, animated by cocoa notes throughout.
text: Delicately rich, deeply sweet. Toffee, mulberry, cedar, roasted cacao nib, rhododendron-like flowers in aroma and cup. Balanced, sweet-tart acidity; plush, buoyantly creamy mouthfeel. The crisply cocoa-toned finish is redolent of almond and rhododendron.  A refined, balanced, sweetly tart Colombia cup, animated by cocoa notes throughout.

desc_1: Deeply rich and sweet-toned. Roasted cacao nib, lily, sandalwood, lychee, hazelnut in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart acidity; satiny smooth mouthfeel. The crisp finish resonates with hazelnut and lily in the short, consolidating to cocoa-toned sandalwood in the gently drying long.
desc_3: A complex Pacamara cup: rich, sweet and driven by deeply expressed cocoa and spicy aromatic wood.
text: Deeply rich and sweet-toned. Roasted cacao nib, lily, sandalwood, lychee, hazelnut in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart acidity; satiny smooth mouthfeel. The crisp finish resonates with hazelnut and lily in the short, consolidating to cocoa-toned sandalwood in the gently drying long. A complex Pacamara cup: rich, sweet and driven by deeply expressed cocoa and spicy aromatic wood.

desc_1: Sweet, round, quietly pungent. Molasses, almond, thyme, cocoa powder, orange zest in aroma and cup. Crisply sweet acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The rich, lightly resonant short finish consolidates to orange zest and cocoa in the long.
desc_3: A vibrant and inviting citrus- and cocoa-toned blend.
text: Sweet, round, quietly pungent. Molasses, almond, thyme, cocoa powder, orange zest in aroma and cup. Crisply sweet acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The rich, lightly resonant short finish consolidates to orange zest and cocoa in the long. A vibrant and inviting citrus- and cocoa-toned blend.

desc_1: Deeply sweet, seductively rich. Lemon drop, sandalwood, starfruit, black honey, fragrant thyme in aroma and cup. Juicy, rich acidity; billowy, silken mouthfeel. Black honey envelopes an herb-toned short finish; crisp lemon complicates the long.
desc_3: A particularly elegant Yirgacheffe cup, deeply and complexly nuanced.
text: Deeply sweet, seductively rich. Lemon drop, sandalwood, starfruit, black honey, fragrant thyme in aroma and cup. Juicy, rich acidity; billowy, silken mouthfeel. Black honey envelopes an herb-toned short finish; crisp lemon complicates the long. A particularly elegant Yirgacheffe cup, deeply and complexly nuanced.

desc_1: Subtly lush, crisply chocolaty. Violet, baker’s chocolate, blackcurrant, fresh-cut oak, almond in aroma and cup. Zesty, sweet acidity; delicate, satiny mouthfeel. Blackcurrant notes dominate in the crisp, resonant short finish, with oak and violet carrying into the long.
desc_3: A pretty violet-toned Central America cup with compelling chocolate notes throughout and a hint of sweetly tart, Kenya-like blackcurrant.
text: Subtly lush, crisply chocolaty. Violet, baker’s chocolate, blackcurrant, fresh-cut oak, almond in aroma and cup. Zesty, sweet acidity; delicate, satiny mouthfeel. Blackcurrant notes dominate in the crisp, resonant short finish, with oak and violet carrying into the long.  A pretty violet-toned Central America cup with compelling chocolate notes throughout and a hint of sweetly tart, Kenya-like blackcurrant.

desc_1: Evaluated as espresso. Balanced, sweetly tart, floral. Baker’s chocolate, honeysuckle, cedar, mango, tangerine zest in aroma and small cup. Juicy, nectar-like body. The rich, resonant finish is saturated with orange-cloaked chocolate notes. In three parts milk, fruit and floral tones round and soften but remain deeply sweet and invitingly tart.
desc_3: Chocolate, citrus and florals carry this engaging, sweetly tart Yirgacheffe espresso.
text: Evaluated as espresso. Balanced, sweetly tart, floral. Baker’s chocolate, honeysuckle, cedar, mango, tangerine zest in aroma and small cup. Juicy, nectar-like body. The rich, resonant finish is saturated with orange-cloaked chocolate notes. In three parts milk, fruit and floral tones round and soften but remain deeply sweet and invitingly tart. Chocolate, citrus and florals carry this engaging, sweetly tart Yirgacheffe espresso.

desc_1: Elegant, crisply sweet. Jasmine, nougat, blood orange, mango, frankincense in aroma and cup. Sweet, softly juicy acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The finish resonates with frankincense and mango; hints of jasmine in the long.
desc_3: A paradoxically juicy-crisp Ethiopia cup, both delicately sweet and bracingly crisp.
text: Elegant, crisply sweet. Jasmine, nougat, blood orange, mango, frankincense in aroma and cup. Sweet, softly juicy acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The finish resonates with frankincense and mango; hints of jasmine in the long. A paradoxically juicy-crisp Ethiopia cup, both delicately sweet and bracingly crisp.

desc_1: Sweetly fruit-forward. Raspberry, baker’s chocolate, brandy, narcissus-like flowers, cashew in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart acidity; Smooth, lightly velvety mouthfeel. The richly drying finish consolidates to dried raspberry and brandy in the short, baker’s chocolate in the long.
desc_3: A chocolaty cup with sweet-fermenty, brandy-like nuance throughout.
text: Sweetly fruit-forward. Raspberry, baker’s chocolate, brandy, narcissus-like flowers, cashew in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart acidity; Smooth, lightly velvety mouthfeel. The richly drying finish consolidates to dried raspberry and brandy in the short, baker’s chocolate in the long. A chocolaty cup with sweet-fermenty, brandy-like nuance throughout.

desc_1: Brightly sweet, crisp. Grapefruit zest, lily, cinnamon, blackcurrant, vanilla in aroma and cup. Lively, juicy acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The rich, deep finish is alive with lily and vanilla suggestions; blackcurrant and grapefruit zest come forward in the long.
